fulltext:
Phung Manh Cuong 
Senior Software Engineer 
Summary 
Software Engineer with more than 5 years experiences, particularly interested in software development 
techniques that help create simple solutions for complex problems. I am passionate about modern software 
development which lead me continue learning new technologies and constantly skill improvement. 
I love the idea about business first thinking/approarch that's the most important when working on Product's 
environment. Moreover, looking for interesting idea to build a strong/userful product in effective way, 
then sharing with others are the things I love to and try to do time by time. 
Education 
B.S., Computer Science, HCM University of Technology, 2013 
Work Experience 
Septemper 2017 - Present, Senior Backend Developer, Contentnet Ltd 
Videofly Dev Team 
Setup and manage the CI/CD system (TeamCity), design and implement release process. 
Research, design and implement recommend system (Mahout, Spark, PredictionIO). 
Works as DevOps that setup and monitoring production and staging enviroment. 
Work with developers to get the feedback about processing and with QA to decide what 
features should be released/deployed for next step. 
Migrate all things from old infrastructe (Redis, Elasticsearch, SVN) to a lot of better one (MySQL, 
Elasticsearch, GIT). 
Septemper 2016 - August 2017, Senior Backend Developer, Lifestyle Project Management 
Timo Backend Team 
Write efficient and testable code, make the code self-testing as much as posible. 
Refactoring the legacy code, step by step make code cleaner and optimizing it. 
Join to discuss bussines requirement with others team and support QA team. 
Maintaining the system and step by step build supporting tools to manage the system. 
August 2015 - August 2016, Java Backend Developer, Big-Labs Pre Ltd 
Smart Shopping Mall 
Analyse business and generate dump data. 
Generate dumps data that support for QC/QA teams. 
Implement report engine via BigLabs's customer requirements. 
Design UX/UI and implememnt visualize tools. 
Work with Frontend and leader to design API via REST style. 
August 2014 - July 2015, Full Stack Developer, Hoiio Pre Ltd. 
Conference Application 
Work with others to design new UI which make user comfortable to use. 
Design and implement both front-end and back-end. 
Design and write document REST API, support for other departments. 
Migrate data from old version application 
Directory Application 
Refactor the code, re-write all the application both front-end and back-end. 
Design new database schema that more compatible with new requirement 
Migrate data from MySQL to new data-store (Elasticsearch). Design and 
implement REST API, writing document. Support others App Owner to 
integrate with Directory App. Step by step improve the code quality, 
adding new feature. 
Staff Application 
Refactoring the code and step by step adding new feature. 
Design and implement back-end, front-end 
Integrate with other Hoiio's application 
Convert UI implement from imagines to Frontend code in HTML, CSS 
August 2013 - July 2014, Java Backend Developer, HDC. 
Server Game SkyGradern 
Discuss with others to get the feedback about the game-server and create new feature 
Improve performance of database and the backend codebase, step by step refactoring. 
Design and implement the api for the mobile team, dicuss with them about request and response 
structure between client and server 
Helping QA team testing some feature that can't be tested from Frontend 
Dynamic configuration: step by step move all the config from file to database table, update config 
every 5 second 
Web Crawler 
Implement a web crawler that get info some webpage (livescore.com, flashscore.com.au) and push 
update to other system 
Key Skill 
English communication 
Java programing language 
MySQL, Elasticsearch 
Big data platform: Hadoop2 + Spark 
Frontend skills

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin
